attributes.title: I hate this President 😃tiktok
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch so much that I can’t even call people and every time go on a app it shows a pic of Trump witch makes me puke. But most of all he is rude on the app and I really just wanted to get this app for fun but now it’s just horrible it made my phone call random numbers and like glitching, I already said that but dang. Oh and every every day I go on an app its saying he’s that worst president to exist (witch I agree) and now I don’t even know why I have the app you know What going to delete it. Ok I’m back so i also got the app to see what’s up with trump but now I can’t see anything because it’s to glitchy and then I figured out HE WANTS TO TAKE DOWN TIKTOK NO NO HUNNY NO. But when I got the app I thought this president would learn and not be racist but he said so many racist things and it made me cry for a month and if I be honest I actually was crying for 5 months but then I learned you can’t change him witch is another reason to not get the app and for some reason he’s trying to take down apps that shows who he really is witch makes me even madder. So now let’s say what he is, he is a racist, idiot, creepy, scary, DOO DOO 💩, orange, mean, rude, and just a horrible president. If he came to me I would start cry because of all the bad stuff he does. Also one day I went on the app to see what he did or what happened but since this app is so bad I couldn’t use my phone for a week because it said that app had a virus like dude you need to become a better and just be nice. He was saying horrible things about people on there and also I saw he posted something so racist on Facebook and Twitter soooooooo why would he make a app because that means no one will ever like him and if you do just stop reading this. ok since there gone please please don’t make him make you feel sad because one day we will have a new president ✊🏾god bless you all and please please get off this app
